00022 #include "cli/endl.h"
00023 #include "cli/cli.h"
00024 #include "cli/menu.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace cli;
00027 
00028 
00029 Endl::Endl(const Help& CLI_Help)
00030   : Element("\n", CLI_Help),
00031     m_pcliMenuRef(NULL)
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00035 Endl::~Endl(void)
00036 {
00037     if (m_pcliMenuRef != NULL)
00038     {
00039         delete m_pcliMenuRef;
00040         m_pcliMenuRef = NULL;
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 Menu& Endl::SetMenu(Menu* const PCLI_Menu)
00045 {
00046     if (m_pcliMenuRef != NULL)
00047     {
00048         delete m_pcliMenuRef;
00049         m_pcliMenuRef = NULL;
00050     }
00051 
00052     GetCli().AddMenu(PCLI_Menu);
00053     PCLI_Menu->SetCli(GetCli());
00054     SetMenuRef(new MenuRef(*PCLI_Menu));
00055     return *PCLI_Menu;
00056 }
00057 
00058 MenuRef& Endl::SetMenuRef(MenuRef* const PCLI_MenuRef)
00059 {
00060     if (m_pcliMenuRef != NULL)
00061     {
00062         delete m_pcliMenuRef;
00063         m_pcliMenuRef = NULL;
00064     }
00065 
00066     PCLI_MenuRef->SetCli(GetCli());
00067     m_pcliMenuRef = PCLI_MenuRef;
00068     return *PCLI_MenuRef;
00069 }
00070 
00071 const MenuRef* const Endl::GetMenuRef(void) const
00072 {
00073     return m_pcliMenuRef;
00074 }
